info.title: Fintech API
info.description: API for transmitex currency exchange and P2P transactions

post.description: Endpoint to register a new user and generate JWT token upon successful registration.
Endpoint to authenticate a user and generate JWT token.
Endpoint to send OTP code to the user's email.

message.example: OTP code has been sent to your email, expires in 10 minutes

post.description: Endpoint to verify OTP code received via email.
Endpoint to change user password after verifying OTP.

Update user profile.

This endpoint allows authenticated users to update their profile information.

400.description: Invalid request or no fields to update

message.example: Wallet has been created for USA successfully
